name: Donkey Kong Country 4 - The DK Bay
name_original: Donkey Kong Country 4 - The DK Bay
description:
Donkey Kong Country 4 - The DK Bay

An extended sequel to the Donkey Kong Country series. This game contains 30 full levels, 60 bonus coins, 7 bosses and a bonus world. Special thanks to aperson98 and Necrotoad of the DKC-Atlas for making custom graphics specifically for this game.

-- For best gameplay experience, Joy2Key is recommended --

https://joytokey.net/en/

Controls
  • Move/Duck: Arrow Keys
  • Jump/Launch Barrel Cannon: X
  • Run/Attack: Z
  • Pause/Menu Select: Enter
  • Switch Character/Jump off Animal Buddy: A
  • Web Platform (When riding Squitter): Shift

Press F1 at any time for in-game instructions.

Background

Originally released in 2011 on the Yoyogames Sandbox (RIP). This game won't be getting any updates or bug-fixes because it's written with very shitty code in Game Maker. I wrote this before I knew how to properly make games, but I polished the hell out of the final product. I tried to combine my favorite aspects of the DKC series into a single fangame. If you get stuck or frustrated, leave a comment and I'll try to help you out. Looking back, the difficulty is a bit much from what I would make nowadays, but it's not so hard that's it's impossible. Enjoy :D
